subject: RE: SSO Users
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Good Morning, 

Thank you for your patience here.
 
Our Engineering team has made adjustments. Please have these users attempt to log in again. If the issue persists, please let me know! 
 
Stay safe,
Alex Culp
 
 
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: SHANNON Travis S [tshannon@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 5/30/2025, 4:10 PM
To: support@flocksafety.com
Subject: RE: SSO Users



Thank you!

 

If we�re able to get this resolved by Monday, it would be appreciated it. We are training our users on it next week, and one of our Admins (Derek DeWitt) is currently locked out of his account because of the dual users.

 

When he tries to log in, it says his account is disabled.

 

 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

 



 

From: Flock Safety Support <support@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Friday, May 30, 2025 13:09
To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: RE: SSO Users

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

I have been advised that this will require an Engineering ticket for further assistance. I'll let you know once this is resolved. 

 

Thank you for your patience in the meantime! 

 

All the best,

Alex Culp

 

 

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Flock Safety Support [support@flocksafety.com]
Sent: 5/30/2025, 2:16 PM
To: tshannon@eugene-or.gov tshannon@eugene-or.gov 
Subject: RE: SSO Users

Hello, 

Thank you for giving us a call. 

 

I'm looking into this issue internally. I'll respond here as soon as this is resolved. 

 

Stay safe,

Alex Culp

 

 

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: SHANNON Travis S [tshannon@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 5/30/2025, 1:01 PM
To: support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com 
Subject: SSO Users

Good morning,

 

We recently enabled Azure SSO for our account.

 

It looks like a few email addresses were set incorrectly, so when the user went to sign in, SSO created them a new account instead of linking with their old one. Is there a way to �combine� the accounts so users don�t lose their alerts and settings?

 

 

Thanks,

 

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806
